Why youâ€™ll love this app:
 1. Save key moments effortlessly:
Bookmark any moment in a video with just a click. No need to remember timestampsâ€”simply pause and save!
 2. Add personal notes:
Attach comments to your bookmarks to keep context or highlight details you want to remember.
 3. Seamless sharing:
Easily share your saved bookmarks with others using a simple link. Perfect for collaboration or sharing favorite scenes.
 4. Support for multiple platforms:
Unlike other apps, this extension works across various video platforms, including YouTube, VK and more.
 5. Intuitive design:
Enjoy a clean and user-friendly interface. Every feature is designed for simplicity and efficiency.
 6. Never lose your bookmarks:
All your saved bookmarks are stored securely and remain accessible even after you close your browser.

Currently Supported Platforms:
This app supports popular platforms like YouTube, VK and others. If your preferred video service isnâ€™t supported, feel free to contact us via email, and Iâ€™ll add it!
